Thanks to Shinjiru

29 Nov 2009

Earlier this year, we started looking for a new hosting location for a directory authority outside the US and EU. After talking to a few ISPs, Shinjiru Technology donated a high-bandwidth server to us. The server has been up and running for a few months now without issues. The staff has been great to work with and we'll soon turn this into a public directory authority for the public Tor Network. This is a public thank you to Shinjiru for supporting online privacy and anonymity with Tor.
